application.controller

Class LaborController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.LaborController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>

    public class LaborController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
    The Labor Controller contains the FXML items for the Manage Labor screen, along with methods to remove employees or hire new applicants
    Author:
    Arielle Griswold-wheeler
